"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5591859d6368726b9b000a49#post_5591859d6368726b9b000a49
[bq="SquiggyBomb"][spoiler]Have you ever woken up with an erection so hard it was actually causing you physical pain?[/spoiler][/bq]
That happens after masturbating a lot of times in the night before sleeping, after that, the penis gets erected many times and for long time due the hormones. 
The penis can only stay erect for about 30 minutes before a lack of oxygen in the blood inflating the penis make the tissue start to starve.
Now imagine if it stays erect almost all the night.
You should give your dick a rest dude.
